component_description: Detection results for Reminder Explanation Section

elements.explanation: Bounding box tightly frames the title text and is well aligned with the element.

elements.label: Reminder Explanation Section > Duolingo Mascot

component_description: Detection results for Notification Permission Prompt

elements.label: Notification Permission Prompt > Container

component_description: Detection results for Lesson Status Summary

component_description: Detection results for Primary Continue Button

elements.label: Primary Continue Button > Button
elements.description: Large green rectangular button with rounded corners spanning across the bottom of the screen, containing white uppercase text 'CONTINUE'.
elements.explanation: Bounding box aligns very closely with the button's actual position and dimensions. Slightly more padding than necessary in the lower margin, but the annotation is visually and positionally accurate.
